author: imakiro
body:
Request
-----------------

The Powershell New-Partition cmdlet is creating an extended type partition when called when there are already 3 primary partitions on an MBR disk.

There is no option to create this 4th partition as Primary, with no parameter capable of specifying this information. 

An old [Stackoverflow post](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26282835/powershell-new-partition-need-4th-partition-to-be-primary-not-extended) references such a need as well as this request
